name: Locic
tagline: Compiler and tools for the Loci programming language.
body:
---------------------------
--- Loci Compiler Tools ---
---------------------------

Website: http://loci-lang.org

This directory contains the compiler (and related tools) 'LOCIC', for the programming language Loci.

See docs/GettingStarted.rst for an explanation of how to build/run the compiler.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
